name: CatSlots
description:
CatSlots
(s)Lots of Cats!

Play the slots, earn $money$ and unlock more-and-more cats in the store!
Every cat has a unique voice. Try to pet them to listen to their *meows* and *purrs*!
A game for cat lovers from a cat lover.

An easy and addictive slot system grants you hours of relaxing gameplay.
Out of money? Don't worry you can restart from $100 anytime!

CatSlots doesn't require any installation.
After the download, you're ready to play!

What are you waiting for? Free them all! :)


Official Discord
